DOC.detailed_description: The current research project aim study efficacy myofunctional therapy orthodontic long-term outcome , : 1 ) Is treat low tongue position lip closure rest sufficient orthodontic short long-term outcome ? 2 ) Does treat atypical swallowing along incorrect tongue position help achieve maintain high outcomes myofucntional orthodontic treatment ?
DOC.criteria: Between 6 14 year old Atypical immature swallow pattern low position tongue rest Be orthodontic patient treat Faculty Dentistry , Universit√© de Montreal Speak understand French without assistance Be good health ( without neurological psychiatric syndrome ) Agree participate sign consent form research Non compliance clinical visit ( eg many miss visit ) Patients previous orthodontic treatment Syndrome know systemic disease ( chronic cardiopulmonary neuromuscular disease , dysmorphia , major craniofacial abnormality )
